name: Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion
name_original: Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion
description:
Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion is an action-platformer game developed by id Software and Gamer's Edge. It came out on 01-01-1991. Softdisk Publishing published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion on PC.
Tom Hall produced the game. Tom Hall directed the game.
